resources.string: get a list of supported commands or the syntax of one command
get version string of the application
upload current track or config data to dropbox
start, stop or reset track or get details about current track information
start or stop localization or get details about last or current location information
start or stop heartrate detection or get details about last or current heartrate information
get specified config settings of a section
get status of services (tracking, localization, heartrate detection)
